projects.title: Your Projects
projects.subtitle: Manage your AI-generated project boards
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.
projects.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All project data will be permanently removed.

newProject.title: Create New Project
newProject.subtitle: Enter your project idea and let AI generate a project board for you
newProject.inputHint: Describe your project in 200 characters or less
newProject.generatingHint: Please wait while we create your project board

errors.generationFailed: Project generation failed. Please try again.

settings.title: AI Configuration
settings.modelTypeDescription: Select the model type to use, only one model is active at a time
settings.aiProviderDescription: Select model provider and model, the system will automatically fill in the API address
settings.openaiKeyFormat: OpenAI API key should start with 'sk-'
settings.anthropicKeyFormat: Anthropic API key should start with 'sk-ant-'

taskDetail.title: Task Details
taskDetail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone.
taskDetail.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All task data will be permanently removed.
taskDetail.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel without saving?
taskDetail.cancelWarning: Your changes will be lost if you cancel without saving.
